titles.title: To require a 25-percent reduction in appropriations for the legislative branch of the Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E919)

bill.summary: 5/12/1994--Introduced. Prohibits appropriations for the legislative branch for FY 1995 from exceeding 75 percent of such appropriations for FY 1994.
